Restore_Essence.display_help: Should you fall in battle, you can Restore your Essence and bring yourself from the brink of death. You will revive with most of your Hit Points and half your Endurance and be protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds. Recharge: Very Long
Restore_Essence.display_attacker_hit: You {PowerName} yourself from the brink of death. You feel weak and cannot do anything for a while.

Proton_Scatter.display_help: The Proton Scatter has reduced your Defense.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

Luminous_Detonation.display_help: The Luminous Detonation has reduced your Defense.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Incandescent_Strike.display_help: The Incandescent Strike has locked you in position. You cannot move and your Defense is reduced.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Pulsar.display_help: Generates a brilliant pulse of Kheldian light around you that stuns nearby foes. Affected foes are Disoriented and unable to defend themselves. Recharge: Very Long

Photon_Seekers.display_help: You manifest 3 spheres of light from your Kheldian essence. These spheres will follow you until they detect an enemy target. The Photon Seekers will then zero in on their targets and detonate on impact. The explosion is small but devastating and may affect multiple foes if they are near the target. Recharge: Long
Photon_Seekers.display_short_help: Summon Drones: Ranged Special, High DMG(Energy)

Shining_Shield.display_help: When you toggle on your Shining Shield, you create an energy barrier that grants you high resistance to Smashing and Lethal damage. Recharge: Fast
Shining_Shield.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has made you highly resistant to smashing and lethal damage.

Maneuvers.display_help: A good leader knows how to protect his team. While active, this power increases the Defense of yourself and all nearby teammates.
Maneuvers.display_target_help: Your Defense is improved due to good teamwork and leadership.
Maneuvers.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's Defense with good {PowerName}.

Assault.display_help: While this power is active, you and your nearby teammates deal more damage.
Assault.display_target_help: Your attack damage is improved due to good leadership and teamwork.
Assault.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's damage potential

Tactics.display_help: While this power is active, your Accuracy and that of all your nearby teammates' is increased. Your advanced Tactics also protect you and your team from Confuse effects, as well as your Perception so you can detect Stealthy foes. You must be at least leve
Tactics.display_target_help: Your Accuracy and Perception is improved due to good teamwork and Leadership.
Tactics.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your team's Accuracy and Perception.
Tactics.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} increases your team's Accuracy and Perception with good {PowerName}.

Light_Form.display_help: When you activate Light Form, you become pure Kheldian energy and are extremely resistant to most damage. You are also partially protected from some Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. While in Light Form, you cannot shape shift into Bright Nova or White Dwarf form. Light Form costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Hit Points and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
Light_Form.display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)
Light_Form.display_attacker_hit: Your Light Form has made you highly resistant to most attacks.

messages.display_victim_hit: Changing into a Light Form has left you exhausted.

White_Dwarf.display_help: Kheldians are masters of energy and matter. A Peacebringer can transform into a massive unstoppable energy beast known as a White Dwarf. When you choose this power, you will have access to 6 other powers that can only be used while in this form. You will not be able to use any other powers while in White Dwarf form. White Dwarf has awesome resistance to all damage except Psionics, as well as controlling effects. White Dwarf also has improved HP and Endurance Recovery, but is limited to melee attacks. Recharge: Fast
